isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - LIFT AXLE SYSTEMS - CONTROLS - INSTALL

step1.para: Install the air line fitting to the replacement gauge.
Install the gauge body into the control panel. Align the slots of the hold down ring with the rear of the gauge body to slip the ring onto the gauge body.
Rotate the hold down ring so that it engages the gauge body.
Insure that the gauge face is correctly oriented and tighten the two hold down ring screws to secure the gauge in the control panel.
Connect the air line to the rear of the gauge.
Install the air line fittings to the replacement regulator.
Install the regulator into the control panel.
Insure that the regulator is correctly oriented and secure it to the control panel with the large mounting nut.
Connect the air lines to the rear of the regulator.
Verify that the switch is correctly oriented before installing the switch from the front of the control panel.
Install the switch by squeezing the locking tabs on the top and bottom of the switch while pushing it through the correct hole in the control panel.
Push the switch connector straight onto the rear of the switch until the connector locks are engaged.
Plug the relay into the relay connector mounted to the rear of the control panel.
